Package be.kdg.processor.fine.services

Class FineService

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.kdg.processor.fine.services.FineService
  • @Service
@Transactional
public class FineService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service used to manipulate Fine information from the H2 in-memory database.
    Author:
    Cédric Goffin
    See Also:
    FineRepository, FineCalculationService

      • fineRepository

        private final FineRepository fineRepository

    • Constructor Detail

      • FineService

        @Autowired
public FineService​(FineRepository fineRepository)
        Constructor used by Spring framework to initialize the service as a bean
        Parameters:
        fineRepository - the repository that has access to the H2 in-memory database

    • Method Detail

      • getFine

        public java.util.Optional<Fine> getFine​(int id)
        Gets information about a Fine.
        Parameters:
        id - is the fine id
        Returns:
        an Optional Fine. Is empty when no Fine could be found or when an error occurred.

      • getFinesByLicenseplate

        public java.util.List<Fine> getFinesByLicenseplate​(java.lang.String licenseplateId)
        Gets all Fines from the repository that are linked to the supplied Licenseplate id.
        Parameters:
        licenseplateId - is the identifier of a Licenseplate
        Returns:
        a list of Fines that are linked to the supplied Licenseplate id

      • getFinesBetween

        public java.util.List<Fine> getFinesBetween​(java.lang.String from,
                                            java.lang.String to)
                                     throws FineException
        Gets all Fines from the repository that where made between the 'from' and 'to' timestamps.
        Parameters:
        from - is the starting time for fines to be returned
        to - is the ending to for fines to be returned
        Returns:
        a list of Fines that where made between the 'from' and 'to' timestamps
        Throws:
        FineException - when the given timestamps aren't in the right order

      • acceptFine

        public java.util.Optional<Fine> acceptFine​(int id)
        Updates a Fine from the repository to set its status as accepted.
        Parameters:
        id - is the id of the fine to set as accepted
        Returns:
        an Optional accepted Fine. Can be empty when no Fine was found for the supplied id.

      • save

        public Fine save​(Fine fine)
        Creates a Fine in the repository
        Parameters:
        fine - is the Fine to persist to the database
        Returns:
        the persisted Fine from the repository

      • saveFines

        public java.util.List<Fine> saveFines​(java.util.List<Fine> fines)
        Creates multiple Fines in the repository
        Parameters:
        fines - a list of Fines that will be persisted to the database.
        Returns:
        a list of Fines from the repository that were persisted to the database
